data.name: OpenGloves - Half-Life: Alyx Force Feedback Integration
data.detailed_description:
OpenGloves is an open source, SteamVR Driver that allows use of virtual reality gloves in games.

This DLC provides support for force feedback in Half-Life: Alyx for the OpenGloves SteamVR Driver.
